name: Aik's Cheese Adventures
description: Your task is to conduct a charismatic mouse Aik through 28 levels in search of all the pieces of cheese scattered here and there in the locations. Use the prop to control the air balloon on which Aik travels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higer Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz or higer Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 147 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7-8 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.6Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher Memory: 3 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 147 MB available space
